example_json_input.description: Scrape the Whatsapp network and fetch profile info of any user, including: Profile picture, About status, or check if it's a Whatsapp for Business or personal account.

input_parameters.name: Numbers
input_parameters.description: An array of phone numbers to be checked on the Whatsapp Network

input_parameters.name: Token
input_parameters.description: An execution token to scrape more than 10 numbers
